name: Gem Collector (itch) (DragonWF)
description:
This game is made as a practice project for messing around with the Unity Engine. Mainly made as a learning experience for me.

The goal in this game is just to collect as many gems as possible before the time runs out. Each gem collected increases your score. Try to get as much as you can possible within the time limit.

You can move with either the arrow keys or with the WASD keys.

One tip: Staying on roads have a slight speed boost.
